entry.tran: (报社、电台或电视台的)新闻编辑室
entry.def: A newsroom is an office in a newspaper, radio, or television organization where news reports are prepared before they are printed or broadcast.

means.word_mean: 1. the staff of a newspaper or the news department of a periodical;

sentences.sentence: "every newspaper editor is criticized by the newsroom"

means.word_mean: 2. an office in which news is processed by a newspaper or news agency or television or radio station
3. a reading room (in a library or club) where newspapers and other periodicals can be read
